ygData.subject: Re: Research
ygData.msgSnippet: North Karana for good, South Ro for evil. The quest sucks and many people do not have enough faction to do it. If you *do* get it ( I did ) then you get to
ygData.messageBody:
North Karana for good, South Ro for evil.

The quest sucks and many people do not
have enough faction to do it. If you *do* get
it ( I did ) then you get to waste several hours
collecting obscure components hoping for
a *chance* to get a 1 pt raise in research, before
finding that the research book is incorrect and
the components do not combine.

As an example the lowest level practice rune
requires :

A Quill
Parchment
A Lapis Lazuli
A Topaz
A Rusty Slashing Weapon
A Fire Beetle Eye
A Bat Wing

One a couple of levels harder requires

A Quill
Parchment
2 Pearls
A Fine Steel Weapon
Ringmail Armor
An Aviak Feather

You need to buy the 10 plat book or you
cannot do any research.






"Shane Bole" <shane0009@...> on 11/08/99 23:48:18

Please respond to EverQuest@onelist.com

To: EverQuest@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: Michael Wyatt/AU/AMP)
Subject: [EverQuest] Research




From: "Shane Bole" <shane0009@...>

I read something about help on the Research skill in north or south
karana... can anyone help out? And do I have to purchase that 10 plat book
in my guild called "Tome of endless Enchantments"? (didnt want to end up
wasting money...)


Fabno, foremerly 17th level Erudite Enchater, Ero Marr
